thread.section_title: Travelopod Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelopod | travelopod.com
thread.title: Piyush Patel

author: Piyush Patel
title: Piyush Patel
text:
This is first time i got ticket from them ,she gave me price and i told her her web has lower price ,she check and told me i had to change airports,and than as i was about to pay, i asked her if i can fly back early from different airport, she checked, and found one,she did very good job, so everything ok.so all of u travel do u homework and they will work with u .
thanks
